topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/550a06746368721c1c7f0b00#post_550a06746368721c1c7f0b00
[bq="SquiggyBomb"]"@Twisty":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/550a05e863687215bf690000#post_550a05e863687215bf690000
I don't get the irrational hatred some people have for anime...[/bq]
Nah; I have to agree on this one; "my little sister can't be this cute" was fucking terrible to the point even fans hate the ending to it.

You know a show is shit when even hardcore fans won't defend the ending.

Why everyone hates the ending:
[spoiler]Short version is that in season 2 they forgo the moral dilema and go the fanservice route of the main character hooking up with his sister, but literally the last five minutes of the show they pull the rug out and turns out they were only pretending to be a couple thus the main character winds up with nobody.

Essentially:
Season 2:
The people watching for the incest, "woohoo!"
People against it, "great another show going down the fanservice route"

Season 2 finale:
*EVERYONE*, "Uggghhh. . that ending was fucking terrible"[/spoiler]
